title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in LLM, chat, and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface); manage models, chat history, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds local AI autocomplete powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama server with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot UI that talks to Ollama via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers, and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Streamlit app for question-answering over PDFs using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels with slash commands and role-based access.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama and insert results directly into your notes.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed, async, and supports streaming chat/generate.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; small surface, context cancellation, and streaming support.
